title: Blinken Reproves China Counterpart Over Support for Russia
sub_head: Secretary of State Antony Blinken’s sit-down with China’s Wang Yi comes amid U.S. effort to isolate Russia at G-20 gathering
body:
NUSA DUA, Indonesia—U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken admonished Beijing over its support for Russia in a meeting with his Chinese counterpart, a sign of how the invasion of Ukraine is complicating efforts to put relations between the two superpowers on steadier footing.
The chief U.S. diplomat sat down with Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Saturday with the aim of improving communication between the countries despite deep-seated differences. The meeting came after a gathering of foreign ministers from the Group of 20 leading global economies in Bali, Indonesia.
